name: Bloody Mary (itch) (DoctorMuskrat)
description:
You play as Bloody Mary, a vampiress bartender whose job is to mix up the best drinks for her bloodthirsty clientele. Blood from a variety of different animals are on the menu here, from fish to birds to reptiles! But beware of allergies!

Submission for Mini Jam 118: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-118-vampires
